verses.text: \w Blessed|strong="H0835"\w* \add is\add* he that \w considereth|strong="H7919"\w* the \w poor|strong="H1800"\w*: the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w deliver|strong="H4422"\w* him in \w time|strong="H3117"\w* of \w trouble|strong="H7451"\w*.\f + \fr 41.1 \ft the poor: or, the weak, or, sick\f*\f + \fr 41.1 \ft in time…: Heb. in the day of evil\f*

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w preserve|strong="H8104"\w* him, and keep him \w alive|strong="H2421"\w*; \add and\add* he shall be \w blessed|strong="H0833"\w* upon the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: and thou wilt not \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* him unto the \w will|strong="H5315"\w* of his \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*.\f + \fr 41.2 \ft thou…: or, do not thou deliver\f*

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w strengthen|strong="H5582"\w* him upon the \w bed|strong="H6210"\w* of \w languishing|strong="H1741"\w*: thou wilt \w make|strong="H2015"\w* all his \w bed|strong="H4904"\w* in his \w sickness|strong="H2483"\w*.\f + \fr 41.3 \ft make: Heb. turn\f*

I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, be \w merciful|strong="H2603"\w* unto me: \w heal|strong="H7495"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*; for I have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* against thee.
Mine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* \w speak|strong="H0559"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* of me, When shall he \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, and his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*?

And if he \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \add me\add*, he \w speaketh|strong="H1696"\w* \w vanity|strong="H7723"\w*: his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w gathereth|strong="H6908"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w* to itself; \add when\add* he \w goeth|strong="H3318"\w* \w abroad|strong="H2351"\w*, he \w telleth|strong="H1696"\w* \add it\add*.

All that \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* me \w whisper|strong="H3907"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w* against me: against me do they \w devise|strong="H2803"\w* my \w hurt|strong="H7451"\w*.\f + \fr 41.7 \ft my…: Heb. evil to me\f*

An \w evil|strong="H1100"\w* \w disease|strong="H1697"\w*, \add say they\add*, cleaveth \w fast|strong="H3332"\w* unto him: and \add now\add* that he \w lieth|strong="H7901"\w* he shall rise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* no \w more|strong="H3254"\w*.\f + \fr 41.8 \ft An…: Heb. A thing of Belial\f*

Yea, mine own \w familiar|strong="H7965"\w* \w friend|strong="H0376"\w*, in whom I \w trusted|strong="H0982"\w*, which did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* of my \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, hath lifted \w up|strong="H1431"\w* \add his\add* \w heel|strong="H6119"\w* against me.\f + \fr 41.9 \ft mine…: Heb. the man of my peace\f*\f + \fr 41.9 \ft lifted…: Heb. magnified\f*
But thou, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, be \w merciful|strong="H2603"\w* unto me, and raise me \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, that I may \w requite|strong="H7999"\w* them.
By this I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that thou \w favourest|strong="H2654"\w* me, because mine \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w* doth not \w triumph|strong="H7321"\w* over me.
And as for me, thou \w upholdest|strong="H8551"\w* me in mine \w integrity|strong="H8537"\w*, and \w settest|strong="H5324"\w* me before thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* from \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w*, and to \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w*. \w Amen|strong="H0543"\w*, and \w Amen|strong="H0543"\w*.
